evidence.text: JANE DOE and JOHN DOE, Plaintiffs

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Individual, described as Jane Doe and John Doe

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Jane Doe is a 21-year-old transgender woman who has been denied critical treatments recommended by her doctors solely because of a federal statute dating to 1976, 10 U.S. C. Sec. 1079 (a)(11).

extracted.value: Jane Doe is a 21-year-old transgender woman.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Jane’s father, John Doe, who served for more than 23 years in the Marine Corps and Air Force.

extracted.value: Jane is a dependent of her father, John Doe, a former Marine and Air Force.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Jane has been denied critical treatments recommended by her doctors solely because of a federal statute dating to 1976, 10 U.S. C. Sec. 1079 (a)(11), that mandates the categorical exclusion of all surgical treatments for gender transition in the military’s medical coverage for eligible dependents of servicemembers.

extracted.value: The federal statute 10 U.S.C. § 1079 (a)(11) excludes coverage for gender transition surgeries for dependents.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Jane has been denied critical treatments recommended by her doctors solely because of a federal statute dating to 1976, 10 U.S. C. Sec. 1079 (a)(11), that mandates the categorical exclusion of all surgical treatments for gender transition in the military’s medical coverage for eligible dependents of servicemembers.

extracted.value: Defendants denied coverage for surgeries recommended by doctors for gender dysphoria.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Jane was diagnosed with gender dysphoria at age 17 in 2018.

extracted.value: Jane was diagnosed with gender dysphoria at age 17 in 2018.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: Defendants have not disputed Jane’s gender dysphoria diagnosis and have covered the expenses of her counseling and HRT as medically necessary treatments.

extracted.value: Defendants have covered counseling and HRT but denied surgery.
